definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: You're in a multi-tasking frame of mind.
sentences.chinese: 你處在一種因處理太多事情而導致的心緒不寧中。

sentences.english: I am listless, I am a wanderer in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我心緒不寧，我是自己心中的流浪者。

sentences.english: As soon as he began to enjoy the food his bladder made him distractive.
sentences.chinese: 他剛剛開動，就讓膀胱攪得心緒不寧。

sentences.english: It steals our peace of mind and prevents us from finding solutions.
sentences.chinese: 焦慮令我們心緒不寧，妨礙我們找到解決問題的辦法。

sentences.english: I am listless， I am a wanderer in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我心緒不寧，我是自己心中的流浪者。

sentences.english: As the years rolled on, it bothered me that I never wrote that letter.
sentences.chinese: 年復一年，沒有寫那封信使得我心緒不寧。

sentences.english: I have been strangely annoyed by the dream ever since.
sentences.chinese: 不知爲何我從此一直被這場夢弄得心緒不寧。

sentences.english: His arrival put the girls in a flutter.
sentences.chinese: 他的到來使她心緒不寧。

definition: to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
to dabble and stop (idiom); to dip into/to attempt half-heartedly/content with a smattering of knowledge
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
lit. heart distracted, thoughts in turmoil (idiom); distraught with anxiety
to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising/hoist by his own petard
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
flesh and blood flying (idiom); carnage/people blown to pieces
